Text: C'mon, fellas, by becoming 'Nation of Islam' Blacks in the US are going against all the will earn them respect since islam is NOT part of the American cultural environment, that way you oppress women, spread fanatic irrationality, condemn fellow Blacks to going backwards instead of forward. Get real, emphasize that at one time long ago WE WERE ALL BLACKS in the world, who turned pale or yellow or red as they migrated, recover your self-esteem and drop the fanatic nonsense...
